item.title: Voronoys
item.description: VORONOYS is a team composed by four statisticians and a political scientist. It begins motivated by the first CEPESP Data challenge, in which the main objective was to show new perspectives on the Brazilian elections. The name is based on the mathematical technique used in this work called Voronoi tessellation.

item.title: Stats4Good
item.description: The Stats4Good is a group founded in 2016 by graduate students of the Statistics Department from Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais, located in Belo Horizonte, Brazil. The group has aimed to provide statistical analysis that can help the society. The Stats4Good principles are Teaching, Learning and Discussing.
